amendment.description: To prohibit the use of funds for providing grants, funding, or any financial benefit to Chinese entities.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1200 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 61 - 36. Record Vote Number: 277.

action.text: Amendment SA 1200 proposed by Senator Hawley to Amendment SA 1092. (consideration: CR S5244-5245) To prohibit the use of funds for providing grants, funding, or any financial benefit to Chinese entities.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 1200 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 61 - 36. Record Vote Number: 277.
